sentences.en: All his life he has been struggling against injustice.
sentences.cn: 他一生都在与不公正现象作斗争.

sentences.en: Anger at injustice formed his character.
sentences.cn: 对不公正现象的愤怒塑造了他的性格。

sentences.en: He had been the victim of a grievous injustice.
sentences.cn: 他曾遭受极不公正的待遇。

sentences.en: He had developed a deep sense of social injustice.
sentences.cn: 他深深感到社会的不公。

sentences.en: His public speeches were permeated with hatred of injustice.
sentences.cn: 在他对民众的演说里,充满了对不公正的愤慨.

sentences.en: His soul has been seared by injustice.
sentences.cn: 他的心灵因受屈辱而变得冷酷无情了.

sentences.en: She knew that if she said nothing she would be conniving in an injustice.
sentences.cn: 她知道她如果什么也不说就是在纵容不公正的行为。

sentences.en: The article does them both an injustice.
sentences.cn: 那篇文章对他们俩都不公。

sentences.en: the causes of poverty and injustice in the Third World
sentences.cn: 第三世界贫穷和不公正的原因

sentences.en: The movie deals with injustices suffered by Native Americans.
sentences.cn: 这部电影讲述印第安人受到的不公正待遇。

sentences.en: The report highlights a number of instances of injustice.
sentences.cn: 这篇报道重点列举了一些不公正的实例。

sentences.en: They complained of injustice in the way they had been treated.
sentences.cn: 他们抱怨受到不公平的对待.
他们将继续与不公平现象作斗争。

sentences.en: Those who have wronged must be ready to say: "We have hurt you by this injustice."
sentences.cn: 冤枉了别人的人一定要勇于说：“我们待你不公，伤害了你。”

sentences.en: You shouldn't do him an injustice.

trans.tran_cn: 不公平，非正义，待…不公正，冤枉
trans.tran_en: a situation in which people are treated very unfairly and not given their rights
